title: Rbot - Watch Face
summary: ⭐️ The coolest robot of the galaxy at your orders !!!
description: Attention: only compatible on devices with ANDROID WEAR OPERATING SYSTEM.A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away...a incredible Watch Face is waiting for you.The war in the galaxy continues, Not official R2D2 watch face app.Experience incredible adventures with the best friend and favorite robot of the galaxy.What you see is what you get.V1.5 Now with sound (only for devices with built-in speaker)V1.4 Now the dimmed lights is the bathery life indicator (Green 100%-80%, Blue 79%-30%, Red 29%-1%).Open the robot chest to acces to new information.Added Step counter.Added watch battery percent.Added week day on the hologram projector.V1.3 Some bugs fixed.Dimmed lights.Secret plans of the hologram projector have been removedPrevious versions:V1.2 Interactive options have been added, click to use the hologram projector and discover the secret plans.Animated graphics have been added.V1.1 We changed the design to make it more realistic.Watch face for round and square clock.Includes environment mode.It does not include settings tab.V1.0 Watch face for round and square clock, includes ambient mode.
descriptionHTML:
Attention: only compatible on devices with ANDROID WEAR OPERATING SYSTEM.

A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away...
a incredible Watch Face is waiting for you.
The war in the galaxy continues, Not official R2D2 watch face app.
Experience incredible adventures with the best friend and favorite robot of the galaxy.
What you see is what you get.

V1.5 Now with sound (only for devices with built-in speaker)

V1.4 Now the dimmed lights is the bathery life indicator (Green 100%-80%, Blue 79%-30%, Red 29%-1%).
Open the robot chest to acces to new information.
Added Step counter.
Added watch battery percent.
Added week day on the hologram projector.

V1.3 Some bugs fixed.
Dimmed lights.
Secret plans of the hologram projector have been removed

Previous versions:
V1.2 Interactive options have been added, click to use the hologram projector and discover the secret plans.
Animated graphics have been added.

V1.1 We changed the design to make it more realistic.
Watch face for round and square clock.
Includes environment mode.
It does not include settings tab.

V1.0 Watch face for round and square clock, includes ambient mode.
comments: Love it! It's looks so good too! I would love a bb8 version!

FANTASTIC  Apart from R2D2 being the coolest droid ever... love this watch face, Looks great and is not a battery drain at all. With the latest update you stepped it upto RAD status for me.  WELL WORTH THE MONEY! #maytheforcebewithyou

Love this watchface so far - exactly what I was looking for, and I love looking down to see lil R2-D2. I think it'd be great to add a BB-8 one, especially as their design is already geared around a circle shape!
Not working on my huawei watch after android wear 2.0 update
Latest update made the watchface not work. LG Watch Sport.
recentChanges: V1.5 Now with sound (only for devices with built-in speaker)
